amendment.description: An amendment numbered 17 printed in Part B of House Report 118-535 to prohibit funding made available by this act from being used by the VA to continue decommissioning mileage reimbursement kiosks at VA facilities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
